question: Which among the following missiles is called the Indian Patriot?
explanation: Akash is considered as the Indian Patriot. The Patriot is an American missile system which was used successfully in neutralising the Iraqi Skud missiles during the first Gulf War in the 90s. The Akash missile was developed by DRDO as part of the Integrated Guided Missile Development Programme and is an all-weather, medium-range, Surface-to-Air Missile system.
